listItem(address,uint256,uint256).details: This prevents non owners of the token to list and also checks the token has not been listed, price must be above 0. People will still have tokens in their Wallets this way...

params.nftAddress: The address of the token that will be listed
params.price: The price in uint of the token

listItem(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Listing your NFT to the marketplace
